title: Secret Sentinels (2R20)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally to discard a condition (or 2 conditions if you spot an Orc).
Lore:	”'Yet so little faith and trust do we find now in the world beyond Lothlórien… that we dare not by our own trust endanger our land.'”
Rarity:	R
